data.title: I Will Fear No Evil
data.meta_description: The brilliantly shocking story of the ultimate transplant from New York Times bestselling author and Science Fiction Grand Master Robert A. data.text:
The brilliantly shocking story of the ultimate transplant fromNew York Times bestselling author and Science Fiction Grand Master Robert A. Heinlein.

As startling and provocative as his famousStranger in a Strange Land, here is Heinlein’s awesome tale about a man supremely talented and immensely old, who discovers that the new life he craves comes with a cost. Transplanted into the body of a beautiful young woman, he must forge a new path forward as unexpected challenges reshape his existence into one ultimately more complex.
